entry.title: Cotton Wine Bag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 2.00

These small blank sacks feature a drawstring top and are natural unbleached 100% Cotton.

Reminder, it is the nature of unbleached cotton to contain flecks in it and have a beige tint. 

They will take fabric dye well. They will take htv very well.

entry.title: Buffalo Plaid Wine Bag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 3.95

Beautiful buffalo plaid wine bags with a ribbon drawstring.

Available in Red buffalo plaid check or White buffalo plaid check

100% cotton

entry.title: Santa Suit Wine Bag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 2.70

I do not know if htv can be applied to these wine bags. You would have to test with low heat. Regardless, they make an adorable gift or tradeshow item.

5.5 x 12 inches

Fleece Polyester

entry.title: Wine Bags - Beige
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 2.00

Blank wine bags in polyester faux jute. 

Make these into the perfect gift set by adding one of our wine stoppers.

Make it a cheeky gift set by adding a saucy saying.

These bags are referred to as 'jute' but they are a synthetic polyester fabric. They take htv very well 

*Polyester bags do have a fusing on the inside that will fuse to itself under high temperatures and pressure. It is advised to use a teflon sheet inside and you may have to lower your temperature and use a longer pressing time. 

Size: 13 x 5.5 inches
